io.permazen.index.Index

  • Packages that use Index 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.core
    Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
    io.permazen.index
    Permazen index classes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NavigableMap<Tuple2<V1,V2>,Index<V3,T>> Index3.asMapOfIndex()

      View this index as a NavigableMap of Indexs keyed by the first three values.
